column4: hello, anyone having problems with firefox with flash and java, default edgy install i386, everytime i visit a page that requiers flash or java ff crashes. any tips on what should I do?
that shouldnt be happening, did you build it in sudo?
LONE: you should be able to apt-get install (assuming you're using ubuntu)
I didn`t built anything, just install flashplugin-nonfree with apt, and java with automatix2
